Text: You shoud try this one which has a new better source. Excellent quality! This encode team is an hdbits internal group. That guarantees! :)

Thanks, mate. Saw it in the theatre some time ago - quite an entertaining Korean film!...

I'm curious though - since it's over two hours long, shouldn't the MKV be around 16GB if the source is BluRay?

Anyway, thanks all the same. cheers :)
